H0.text: The remains of which ancient city were discovered by Heinrich Schliemann in the 1870s. Mycenae

H1.text: The remains of which ancient city were discovered by Heinrich Schliemann in the 1870s. Knossos

H2.text: The remains of which ancient city were discovered by Heinrich Schliemann in the 1870s. Pompeii

H3.text: The remains of which ancient city were discovered by Heinrich Schliemann in the 1870s. Troy

A4.text: The site was excavated by Heinrich Schliemann and Frank Calvert starting in 1871.
